verbs.description: [ARG1: super bowl promotion] [V: costing] [ARG2: furniture store] big seattle win in sunday super bowl could cost the owner of a houston furniture story about 7 million as part of a promotion jim mcingvale flipped a coin to decide if his store would bet on houston jim mcingvale super bowl denver promotion seattle
